title: Sans similar to Cassius Sans (MATD work by Mathieu Reguer)?
content:
What sans face would most closely resemble this?

I'm thinking take away some of the flares and you've got something Lisboa Sans-ish . . . maybe Linotype Finnegan.

Anything else?

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020152925im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cas_sans_4943.png)
author: _Palatine_

comments.content: Would you consider [Magma](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020152925/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/stone/magma/magma/) close? Its proportions are rounder, I guess.

It reminds me of [Fontin Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020152925/http:/www.josbuivenga.demon.nl/fontinsans.html), but YMMV.  
Andreas
I think [Orenga](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020152925/http:/www.vllg.com/Incubator/Orenga) has a similar feel.
